description:
Southern boundary next to play area
(TPO ref - TPO 419/2009)

T1 (TPO-T35) Sycamore - Reduce lower overhang (over children's play area) by a maximum of 3m and lightly reduce crown above to create a natural flowing outline
T2 (TPO - T36) Sycamore - Reduce lower overhang (over children's play area) by a maximum of 3m and lightly reduce crown above to create a natural flowing outline
T3* Horse Chestnut - Reduce lower overhang (over children's play area) by a maximum of 3m and lightly reduce crown above to create a natural flowing outline
T4 (TPO - T37) Sycamore - Reduce lower overhang (over children's play area) by a maximum of 3m and lightly reduce crown above to create a natural flowing outline
T5 (TPO - T38) Sycamore - Reduce lower overhang (over children's play area) by a maximum of 3m and lightly reduce crown above to create a natural flowing outline

*T3 is not protected by planning legislation
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
